{{About|the PlayStation exclusive iteration of the 2nd Birthday Skin Pack, also known as 2nd Birthday Skin Pack - 2015 on Bedrock Edition|the 2nd Birthday Skin Pack featuring several Xbox themed skins originally released in 2014|2nd Birthday Skin Pack}}{{Exclusive|bedrock|console|customtext=This feature is exclusive to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' and [[Legacy Console Edition]] on PlayStation consoles.}}

[[File:2nd Birthday PS SP.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''2nd Birthday Skin Pack''',<ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|677779344631193601|To celebrate the 2nd birthday of Minecraft on Sony consoles, there's a free 2nd Birthday Skin Pack on PS3 & PS4 :)}}</ref> named '''2nd Birthday Skin Pack - 2015''' {{in|be}}, is a free [[skin pack]] that includes 24 party-themed skins celebrating the second anniversary of ''[[Legacy Console Edition]]'s'' release on PlayStation consoles. It was originally available on {{editions|ps3|ps4|psvita}} from December 18 to December 29, 2015.<ref>{{cite|url=https://blog.playstation.com/archive/2015/12/18/biggest-ever-minecraft-update-launches-today/|title=Biggest ever Minecraft update launches today!|website=PlayStation.Blog|date=December 18, 2015|author=Sam Khaneka|quote=That’s not all for free content though! We’re also celebrating the second birthday of Minecraft on PlayStation consoles with an exclusive PlayStation Birthday Pack! From now up until 29th December, you can download the following PlayStation-themed goodies: [...]}}</ref>

Due to the release of ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' on PlayStation 4, it was added to the Marketplace on December 9, 2019, although it is only available to players on PlayStation 4 who owned it already when they migrated from Legacy Console Edition.
